==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=丅}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{lang|zh|下}} in its shell and bone form is an {{liushu|i|nocap=y}} that shows the concept of ''[[down]]'' by showing one line [[below]] another (contrast {{m|zh|上}}). The shell and bone form evolved into {{lang|zh|下}}, the character used today.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[lower]] [[part]], [[low]] [[position]]; [[down]]
#: {{zh-ant|上}}
#* {{zh-x|樓下|downstairs}}
# [[under]]
#* {{zh-x|樹下|under the tree}}
#* {{zh-x|在 這些 條件 下|under these conditions}}
# [[low]]
#* {{zh-x|下層|lower level}}
# [[inferior]], [[poor]]
#* {{zh-x|下品|inferior products}}
# [[next]]
#* {{zh-x|下次|next time}}
# to [[go down]]; to [[get]] [[out]] of
#* {{zh-x|下船|to disembark from a boat}}
#* {{zh-x|下樓|to go downstairs}}
#* {{zh-x|下山|to go down the mountain}}
#* {{zh-x|走下|to walk down}}
#* {{zh-x|下床|to get out of bed}}
# to [[fall down]]; to [[rain]] or [[snow]]
#* {{zh-x|落下|to fall down}}
#* {{zh-x|下雪|to snow}}
#* {{zh-x|下雨|to rain}}
# to [[give]]; to [[issue]]
#* {{zh-x|下令|to issue an order}}
# to [[put in]]
#* {{zh-x|下 麵條|to put noodles into boiling water}}
# to [[begin]], to [[start]]
#* {{zh-x|下筆|to start writing}}
# to [[finish]], to [[complete]]
#* {{zh-x|下班|to get off work}}
#* {{zh-x|下課|to finish class}}
# to [[give birth]] (as an animal)
#* {{zh-x|下 豬仔|to have piglets}}
# to [[lay]] (egg)
#* {{zh-x|下蛋|to lay eggs}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} {{zh-abbrev|*下載|to download}}
#* {{zh-x|先 去 下 個 軟件。|'''Download''' the software first.}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} {{zh-abbrev|*下線|to log out}}
# [[with]], [[in]]
#* {{zh-x|在 朋友 的 幫助 下|with help from friends}}
# {{n-g|Used after a verb to express height.}}
# {{n-g|Used after a verb to express space.}}
# {{n-g|Used after a verb to express the separation of an object.}}
# {{n-g|Used after a verb to express the end of an action.}}
# {{n-g|Classifier for the number of actions.}}
